BluetoothUtils

public class BluetoothUtils
extends Object

java.lang.Object
   ↳ com.android.tradefed.util.BluetoothUtils

Utility functions for calling BluetoothInstrumentation on device

Device side BluetoothInstrumentation code can be found in AOSP at: frameworks/base/core/tests/bluetoothtests

Summary

runBluetoothInstrumentation

String runBluetoothInstrumentation (ITestDevice device, 
                String command)

Convenience method to execute BT instrumentation command and return output

Parameters
command String: a command string sent over to BT instrumentation, currently supported: enable, disable, unpairAll, getName, getAddress, getBondedDevices; refer to AOSP source for more details
Returns
String output of BluetoothInstrumentation
Throws
DeviceNotAvailableException
